instructions: Tap the genres you like (double-tap those you love, and touch and hold the genres you don t care for). Tap Next, then do the same with the artists that appear.
Tap For You, then tap a playlist or album. Tap Play or tap the Shuffle button to shuffle the playlist or album.
Go to Settings , then tap Music. Turn on Show Star Ratings. In Music, touch and hold a song in your library, tap Rate Song, then choose a rating from one to five stars.
Go to Settings , then tap Music. Turn off Use Listening History.
